REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f4231 reute d f BC-HADRON-<HDRN.O>-GETS 06-18 0046

TEXT.TITLE: HADRON <HDRN.O> GETS MARTIN MARIETTA <ML> PACT
TEXT.BODY: Hadron Inc said it has received a two mln dlr two-year contract from Martin Marietta Corp for information and logistical support services to be provided for the U.S. Navy's electronic warfare programs. Reuter
